mapper.select: SELECT DAY(a.APM_DATE) AS day, COUNT(a.APM_ID) AS count FROM appointment a WHERE MONTH(a.APM_DATE) = #{month} AND YEAR(a.APM_DATE) = #{year} GROUP BY DAY(a.APM_DATE) ORDER BY DAY(a.APM_DATE);

SELECT ast.ATTIME AS attime , ast.APM_ID AS apmId , ast.APMS_STATUSDESCRIPTION AS description , s.STT_NAME AS status FROM apm_stt ast JOIN status s ON s.STT_ID = ast.STT_ID WHERE ast.APM_ID = #{id} ORDER BY ast.ATTIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(ast.APM_ID) FROM apm_stt ast JOIN appointment a ON a.APM_ID = ast.APM_ID WHERE a.CTM_ID=#{customerId} AND ast.STT_ID=3 AND ast.APMS_STATUSDESCRIPTION NOT LIKE '%Nhân viên%' AND ast.APMS_STATUSDESCRIPTION NOT LIKE '%đã cập nhật trạng thái%' AND ast.ATTIME BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND NOW();
